Description:
Rare Residential Zone 1 Property with Impressive Subdivision Potential (STCA) 1 Acre Approx.
Be it privileged family living or incredible development potential (STCA) this 4448m2 approx. property in Drysdale with a central location is exciting. Entering the market as one of the larger land parcels in Drysdale, with potential to subdivide into 14 x 300sqm allotments (STCA), this certainly is a lucrative investment.
The homes itself needing some TLC, comprises of four bedrooms, two with built in robes, the third with freestanding robes and master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe. The home boasts two bathrooms with the main bathroom consisting of the second toilet, separate shower and bath tub that leads to the large two way laundry with dual sinks.
The spacious kitchen comprises of electric stove and oven with meals area and loads of cupboard space and shelving opening to the lounge and formal living area with Coonara wood fire heater. The lock up four car garage plus carport also is used for supplying the large water tank.
With walking distance access to central Drysdale, local schools, shops and recreational reserves the rare residential zone 1 development site, argues well for development purposes (STCA).
The location provides a wonderful work-life balance, 20 minutes from Geelong CBD and The Bellarine beaches, and within walking distance of all family amenities in this rapidly developing growth suburb.
View without delay!
- Rare 4448m2 approx. property in Central Drysdale
- Incredible development potential 14 x 300m2 sites (STCA)
- 4BR, 3 living area home with 4 car DLUG plus carport
- Potential to subdivide into 10x300sqm allotments (STCA)
- Argues well for development purposes (STCA).
- 20 minutes from Geelong CBD and The Bellarine beaches

Description:
Fully Serviced - 764m2 Premium Home Site
Perfectly located on sought-after Station Street is this 764m2 block of premium land. An idyllic setting, combining a country outlook and feel with the convenience of being only 2 minutes from the Drysdale town centre.
This flat and usable block has all of the hard work completed for you with all connections available including, electricity, telephone water and gas as well as brand new paling boundary fencing. Making the most of its location; close to parks, the Bellarine Rail Tail, and only a short drive to both Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast.
Rarely does the opportunity to build your dream home from ground up present itself in this tightly held pocket where vacant land is a true gem.

Description:
"Strathallan" - The Best of the Bellarine
Steeped in history and offering a lifestyle incomparable to most on the Bellarine, "Strathallan" presents you with fertile, farm-zoned acreage in a well acclaimed, prestigious location. Owned by the same family for decades and only now being offered to the market, it's easy to comprehend why it's been so hard to let go. Surrounded by the contrast of rolling green pastures and aqua marine horizons beyond, the scenic panorama will draw you in and cradle you within the abundant comforts of nature.
The original, three bedroom storybook cottage offers more than adequate lodgings, well orientated with the kitchen and sunroom placed to the north, imploding with sunshine and warmth. A deck with a like-minded aspect is a welcome addition, further increasing the homes gratifying footprint and adding an indoor/outdoor component for the summer months. Comfortability is accounted for with a commodious wood fire working in unison with reverse cycle heating/cooling and a Vulcan wall heater, to ensure the winter months are also to be enjoyed.
After a hard day toiling on your breathtaking estate, it's straight to the cellar door. The highly acclaimed Scotchmans Hill Winery is within walking distance to the property, the celebrated Spray Farm and Terindah Estate wineries are also stationed close by, giving rise to some of the highest standards of Viticulture in Victoria on your doorstep. Your location is further unsurpassable with convenient access to the pristine beaches, eateries and regional assets offered throughout the Bellarine Peninsula, all within close proximity. This property is unique to the market and well worthy of your inspection today.
- Approx. 3.65 acres of picturesque, fertile, farm-zoned land in a prestigious location
- Family owned for decades, being offered to the market for the first time
- Port Phillip Bay outlook from various points across the estate
- Historic, 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom cottage with potential for renovation (STCA)
- Access to some of the highest acclaimed wineries and eateries in the region
- Various outbuildings offering multi-use solutions and various storage options

Central Location!
*CANCELLED OPEN HOME SATURDAY 15 JULY. CONTACT AGENT*
Situated in the heart of Drysdale township is this immaculate 3 bedroom property. Just a short stroll to all amenities it offers the lucky buyer spacious open plan kitchen, meals and lounge room, 3 good sized bedrooms all with robes, full ensuite plus central bathroom and lovely undercover outdoor living area. The property has been lovingly cared for and requires absolutely nothing spent on it. Central gas heating plus reverse cycle split system keep the home comfortable all year round. Quality fixtures and fittings through-out. Single remote garage. This property is going to impress all those who view it. Be quick to make this your new home!

Description:
20 Acres, 2 Homes, Peace And Serenity!
Ahh... the serenity! The land on Basin Road offers true rural respite. Set within an undulating landscape with stands of gums this peaceful 20 acre (8.09Ha approx) property is ideal for equine lovers, or those wanting to escape the rat race and live a more organic, self-sufficient lifestyle. Boasting 2 homes, views to Mount Martha and convenience to town, this property is worthy of inspection.
-Fabulous coastal-rural fusion, just 3mins to Drysdale and 8mins to Ocean Grove beaches
-Original 3-bedroom home;
-Large north-facing kitchen/living/dining hub wrapped by deck, patio and gorgeous vistas
-Rustic features include wood fire, vintage beams, hardwood and concrete floors
-St George cooker, F&P dishwasher, step-in pantry and bespoke timber benches
-Newly renovated bathroom with in situ shower, floating vanity and back-to-wall toilet
-Large country-style laundry
-Main BR with ensuite, BIR and yard access
-BR 2 with WIR, BR3 with WIR and adjoining study nook
-2nd sunny living area with yard access
-Double carport
-Contemporary kit home;
-Classified as an habitable outbuilding with 2BRs, an office and 2 bathrooms
-Beautiful north-facing aspect with sunlit deck and open plan living hub with split system AC
-Master BR upstairs with outstanding rural views, ensuite and WIR
-Main bathroom with bath and shower
-Separate driveway, single garage and storeroom
-Land and outbuildings;
-2 stables with tack room and a floodlit menage training arena ideal for horse lovers
-Large contemporary shed with power, bathroom, storeroom and roller door
-Various shedding includes 2 open bay machinery sheds, old shearing shed and wood shed
-Multiple paddocks and the house paddock
-Approximately 8,000L of rainwater storage
-Zoned ‘farming’
Enjoy an inspection here! Discover the tranquillity and excellent coastal-rural lifestyle on offer!
Insights: 15 Basin Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Family Living
Spacious double storey 3 bedroom home just right for all types of families. Downstairs entrance plus 5m x 6m theatre/rumpus room for the kids. Upstairs is a huge 6m x 6m lounge plus a separate dining area with doors to an outside decking and a sunny rear courtyard. Well-appointed kitchen with polished timber flooring, gas and electric cooking, dishwasher, island bench and double pantry. Main bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in robe. double garage with remote door and direct access. Located within easy walking distance to Drysdale shops, schools, and bus stop.

Description:
The Final Piece Of The Puzzle
It is rare to be offered an opportunity to capitalise on someone elses hard work and clear vision. Here is that very opportunity! The final piece of the puzzle is now available to complete Drysdale's most exclusive and sought after development located adjacent the Central Walk Estate along Woodville Street, Drysdale.
Concept designs have been generated to show the potential for a 35 lot subdivision and incorporates the continuation of beautified waterways already seen in the estate. The concept offers a blend of generous sized blocks up to larger, more prized and rare allotments never before made available this close to Drysdale.
The astute developer will be given an amazing opportunity to complete this brilliant estate with ease, as all of the infrastructure and guidelines have been established & the position has been proven to sell well and retain value. Drysdale is undergoing a major transformation with private and public investment focused on local development from multi-national companies including Aldi & Coles and government funded projects including the Drysdale Bypass; this is where the smart money is being invested as the Bellarine Peninsula growth is just starting to happen. Here is your chance to be an integral part of that growth and opportunity.
Tenders to be submitted before 11.00am, 13th of June, 2017. All tenders to be delivered to:
Stockdale and Leggo
Att:- Daniel Lamanna
2/11 Clifton Springs Road
Drysdale VIC 3222.

Description:
Low maintenance lifestyle
Perfectly located close to Drysdale, with access to all amenities only a stones throw away.
This townhouse is better than a unit, as it is on its own title with no shared driveways or owners corporation, comprising 3 bedrooms, a central two-way bathroom, secure backyard, all in a neat and tidy package in a prime, sought-after central Drysdale location.
This well built brick-veneer beauty has had the same owner since new and has been looked after meticulously. Lock the car up in the secure garage and walk to all shops, restaurants, cafes, doctors and other specialty destinations Drysdale has to offer.
With all of the modern creature comforts including dishwasher, reverse cycle air conditioner and gas cooktop, this low-maintenance home offers all of the lifestyle benefits without the fuss. Homes in this precinct are highly sought after and do not last long on the open market.. contact me today to arrange your inspection before it's too late!

Description:
Build Your Dream
Superbly located in an exclusive street right in the heart of Drysdale and within walking distance from all the action sits this massive 1434sqm (approx) allotment. Offering a North facing aspect and surrounded by prestigious homes making this the perfect platform to build your dream home and raise a family. The block provides all the space you could need to build your home plus a pool plus a shed (STCA). Drysdale has received some expansive infrastructure in recent times and quickly become a desirable place to live on the Bellarine Peninsula. Enjoy being only a short drive to surf beaches, boats ramps, golf courses and wineries along with highly regarded Primary and Secondary Education.

Description:
4.5 Acres Of Hidden Treasure
Attention Developers or those wishing to simply escape the rat-race.This is certainly a case of Hidden Treasure. A majestic three level family home sits privately on 4.5 acres (approx') of beautiful undulating land. This 4 bedroom plus study character home with ducted gas heating and vacuum system, has a very welcoming feel and a family friendly floor plan. Three separate living areas, one with a stunning, ornate fire place surround and all with picturesque views across the rolling hills. On the second level you will find a huge quality Blackwood kitchen, complete with electric oven, 900mm wide HP's,dishwasher and WIP, also with incredible sprawling views. On this level there are two spacious bedrooms with BIR's, a family bathroom, large study, laundry and family room opening to a large patio. A wonderful feature of the home is a central Atrium which streams natural light throughout the home. The top level consists of an extremely spacious master bedroom with, private balcony ensuite, WIR, an adjoining parents retreat (or 4th bedroom),along with a Rumpus room. Every window of the home captures picture perfect views to Geelong and beyond and the surrounding gums and lovingly cared for gardens. At the base of the home you will be blown away with the 6 car garage/workshop. The serenity of this unique property is simply amazing. The sheer size of the home could also lend itself to a Bed and Breakfast, but let's not forget the land content. Four and a half acres may create excellent opportunities for a developer re subdivision STCA. Please don't hesitate with inspecting this property as these opportuniIes don't come along too often.

Description:
BEST POSSIBLE LOCATION
Located in central Drysdale this brick veneer home is situated on a 683m2 block with side lane access.
This 3 bedroom with 1 bathroom home is a developers dream (STCA), for the first home buyer, or even if it's time to down size. North facing lounge room captures winter sunlight, gas heater and ceiling fan, ensure year round comfort.
The spacious kitchen and meals area would be great for family dining or to entertain guests.
Off this area, an enclosed sun room creates extra living Space. The large backyard with a double garage complete with power would be great for the home handyman. Having rear access would be great for a caravan or boat enthusiast.
In this location you are within walking distance to schools, local shops, post office, banks, cafes, transport and even the local bowls or croquet clubs. This home is currently tenanted on a periodical lease but can also be made available with vacant possession. This property won't last long as it is in the heart of Drysdale and walking distance to everything you need. Don't miss out, call me to find out more and arrange an inspection today.

Description:
One Of A Kind
Tucked behind the brow of the Bellarine hills, this outstanding lifestyle property harnesses a spectacular north-westerly panorama over Port Phillip Bay, Geelong, Otway Ranges, Bass Strait and the You Yangs. Encompassing 10 picturesque acres (approx), this stunning package includes a large home recently built by Duncan Pascoe, with many high-end features. This one is outstanding!
Home One
-The home is absolutely stunning, brimming with contemporary coastal style
-Large windows harness the epic views and bring the serene rural ambiance indoors
-The design is split providing a social zone for living and a private zone for slumber
-Each zone boasts individual evaporative cooling and hydronic heating systems
-Eco design principles include wide north and western eaves and double glazing
-The bay panorama is almost overwhelming in the vast open plan living area
-The nightlights and sunsets are absolutely enchanting
-The kitchen is ‘to die for’ with lavish stone benches including a built-in dining table
-Chefs will enjoy the butler's pantry, St George double ovens and Miele dishwasher
-Dining sits under a vaulted ceiling and flows towards to an undercover deck
-Deck entertaining is sun-drenched and perfectly positioned for total view admiration
-The stone feature wall in the living area houses a beautiful fireplace
-The large study/lounge is a versatile room that neighbours the open plan living area
-Double bracket roller blinds allow sheer screening or total block-out
-A powder room and storeroom are convenient to the living spaces
-Step up to the private bedroom zone with stunning master suite and kids domain
-The master suite flows to a private deck with the big You Yangs vista front and centre
-The lavish en suite and His and Hers robes are also impressive
-The laundry and storage hub divide the master and minor BRs wings
-Kids will love their own central rumpus space with built-in desks and personal deck
-One of the minor BRs boasts en suite facilities, the others share a main bathroom
-All feature fully-fitted walk-in robes
-Stylish wet areas include stone floors, Caesarstone vanities and back-to-wall WCs
-The exposed aggregate parking bay seconds as a scenic outdoor entertaining spot
-The original 4BR home still stands, and has a scenic light-filled design with 2 living zones and a study
-The home has a family-friendly alfresco entertaining area with fenced lap pool
-There is also a sauna, adventure playground, trampoline and cubby house!
-A mixed fruit orchard, big chicken coop and vegetable gardens covers 1 acre of land
-A 2nd acre has an electric fence ideal for a horse or other hobby farm pursuits
-The field of Oak trees, rose picking garden and the AFL goal posts are novel additions
-Detached double garage with single garage-sized storage shed beside
-2-bay machinery shed ideal for ‘toys’ or farm equipment plus various storage sheds
-100,000L rainwater storage as well as town water
-The property is protected from the prevailing southerly weather
-Established Cypress shelterbelts promote privacy
Home Two
Subject to council approval, rental income could be earned from the original residence which still exists on the property or alternatively it can provide ideal guest accommodation, a teenagers retreat, home office, bed & breakfast business. The original home offering a beautiful Tuscan feel is in excellent condition with a brand new fire place, split system and sensational views too. Located only metres from the main residence, it provides a wonderful escape or business opportunity for the creative owner.
The Portarlington Ferry is only 10 minutes away and is now commuting to Melbourne three times a day, set 5mins from Drysdale, 25mins from Geelong and 20mins from Bellarine beaches, this truly breathtaking lifestyle package is beyond compare. Prepare to be impressed!
Insights: 135 Settlement Road South, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
PRIVATE HAVEN ON 5 ACRES, JUST MINUTES FROM TOWN...
Opportunities like this just simply dont come around often. Set on approximately five acres, this gorgeous mud brick three bedroom home will give you that spacious country chalet feeling all year round, despite being only minutes from everything Drysdale has to offer. All you need to do is move in, sit back by the wood fire, relax and take in the spectacular views.
Downstairs consists of two spacious bedrooms with BIR, open plan living with newly renovated kitchen flowing outside onto the all weather alfresco entertaining area overlooking the picturesque scenery.
The upstairs loft serves as the perfect adults retreat comprising master bedroom with full ensuite, a home office, sitting room and access onto the large North facing private balcony that allows for viewing of the bay and you yangs.
With ease of access onto the entire Bellarine Peninsula from this position, you can have your choice of quiet bliss, wining and dining in the many Bellarine Vineyards or a quick trip to Melbourne on the Ferry.

Description:
A Faultlessly Appointed Masterpiece
Set on just under an acre with a remarkable northerly aspect for all day sun through the living areas, this is your opportunity to secure a piece of rural Bellarine Peninsula in the center of Drysdale. This magnificent five-bedroom, three-bathroom residence with free flowing living spaces is a masterpiece of modern Australian design.
A full sized table billiards room with wet bar, family room and kitchen all individually open and flow onto the Blackbutt Hardwood Deck from the polished concrete flooring throughout the home, making entertaining a breeze all year round. The kitchen is state-of-the-art with luxurious Essastone benchtops and pendant lights, Siemens oven with an accompanying steam combi oven and warmer with additional integrated appliances to maintain the streamlined aesthetic including dishwasher and induction cooktop; while the spacious Butler's pantry and plumbed fridge space are an added convenience.
The palatial main bedroom suite has a vast dressing room and en suite with bath; while the private guest room enjoys a hotel-inspired en suite with hydronic towel heater, built in robes, and Foxtel & Smart TV Ethernet points which are distributed throughout the entire home. A large home office and study has been designed to be closed off for privacy required for the busy students, whilst the rumpus room at the rear of the home and a further 3 bedrooms in a separate wing with a central bathroom allow for the space today's family unit requires.
Faultlessly appointed, the home integrates every luxury including split system air conditioning, hydronic heating throughout, double glazed windows, stunning polished concrete flooring, keyless entry, comprehensive storage, large fitted laundry, 23,500L of tank water to be used in conjunction with town water for the house and garden & an oversized triple garage with mudroom and internal access.
In a central Drysdale location, this stunning residence combines an irreplaceable rural setting and outlook with magnificent amenities within close proximity of the Bellarine Peninsula wineries, restaurants, golf courses, schools and bay beaches.

Description:
Lifestyle Property with Views to Corio Bay
Commanding views of Corio Bay and evening sunsets dominate this idyllic property perched high on the slopes of Murradoc Hill overlooking the Drysdale countryside. Established trees give privacy and attract local birdlife whilst you absorb the peace and quiet.
Situated on approx 7.7 acres and known locally as the Black Hills. The black clay soil produces some of the best wine on the Bellarine. This majestic European-flavoured home was built to last with solid brick features and cedar timber panelling throughout. On entry the imposing living room has towering ceilings and open fireplace. The home flows seamlessly through a formal dining area, kitchen and family area all facing to the north-west providing natural light and warmth. Two minor downstairs bedrooms are serviced by a family bathroom and rumpus area or sitting room. Leading upstairs to the master suite is a study or fourth bedroom. The open loft-like retreat sits adjacent to the master bedroom and ensuite which incorporates its own balcony with spectacular views.
Outdoors is a blank canvas with potential plus for rolling gardens, a new vineyard or several paddocks for livestock. An over-sized double garage is attached to the main dwelling and a small outbuilding used as an observatory for star-gazing has power connected and manual opening roof. Town water is connected via a private line to the property with tank water available.
Inspection is a must for potential purchasers looking for that sea or tree change with the convenience of good schools, local amenities and leisure activities nearby. Contact the agent to arrange your appointment
to inspect this beautiful property on the outskirts of Drysdale.
Luke Campbell : 0409 554 949
